## Problem 2
```{r power}
#test df
df1 = tibble(
  x = rnorm(30, mean = 0, sd = 5))

#function
a_sample = function(a) {
  a_data = tibble(
    a = rnorm(30, mean = 0, sd = 5))
  a_result = t.test(a_data)
}

#writing loop
output = vector("list", length = 5000)

for (i in 1:5000) {
  output[[i]] = tidy(a_sample())
}

df3 = bind_rows(output)
```
